/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and beige, rise majestically against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun casts its warm glow on the buildings, highlighting their architectural details. The image is taken from the center of the street, providing a comprehensive view of the cityscape.
